data: There entered, in the front drawing-room of my father’s house in Russell Street, an Elf! clad in white,—small, delicate, with curls of jet over her shoulders; with eyes so large and so lustrous that they shone through the room as no eyes merely human could possibly shine.
The Caxtons: A Family Picture — Volume 08
